1037270.name: 酔いどれクイズshow 標鍛
1037270.description:
It is a quiz variety program that is currently a social problem
In this program, it is said that if the Challenger challenges four genres and clears all, they will be able to get luxurious prizes
Although it is a program that often happens
The problem is that if the quiz fails, the challenger is put to drink
It means that the sake is presented to the viewer
The person who is made to drink returns to the original after a certain time after being released from the body of the person who ingested
This is causing various problems

I was invited to such a program
I'm terribly worried
